pages.text: You've got blaze rods! Grind it into powder.$(br)You need it to make eyes of ender!

pages.title: The eye of ender
pages.text: It spies for an entrance to the end of everything.$(br2)Equip it, then use it.
You've found a stronghold!$(br2)These are not like your vanilla strongholds tthough.$(br)Here, they are huge. Try to find the portal and make sure, that you brought $(l)a lot$() of eyes of ender.
Once you assembled the portal, prepare yourself for a big fight!$(br2) You will only be able to leave, again, once you defeated the dragon!
Welcome to the end!$(br2)Please defeat the dragon now, so we can continue.$(br2)After you accomplished that, you see a teleporter appear.$(br)Grab an ender pearl and start exploring the end!
Don't be surprised! The end got a huge content upgrade. Feel free to explore all the new biomes and plant life, of the end.
